text: Marino Quaresimin (22 November 1937 - 20 March 2020) was an Italian politician. He was born in Venice, Italy. Quaresimin was Mayor of Vicenza from 1995 to 1998. == Career == During his political career, he was a member of the Italian People's Party, but later switched to Democracy is Freedom party. From 1999 to 2008, he was a member of the Vicenza city council. ==Death== During the 2020 coronavirus pandemic, Quaresimin died of COVID-19 on 20 March 2020 in Vicenza, aged 82.Coronavirus, morto l'ex sindaco Marino Quaresimin ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy Category:Politicians from Veneto Category:Italian mayors Category:People from Venice
title: Marino Quaresimin
